# {{lb|fr|dated}} to [[threaten]], to guarantee that there will be [[hell to pay]], that there will be severe [[retribution]], that there will be [[trouble]]
types.html:
ne pas promettre poires molles

  1. (dated) to threaten, to guarantee that there will be hell to pay, that there will be severe retribution, that there will be trouble
trans: to threaten, to guarantee that there will be hell to pay, that there will be severe retribution, that there will be trouble
